channel.title: iRevolution
channel.description:
[center][b]Introduction[/b][/center] Remember when you would make millions of gp in one day pking in Edgevill? Or how about being able to kill people with a dds instead of a godsword or claws. How about sitting in Falador merchanting items? Well that's why we're here. [center][b]Goal[/b][/center] iRevolution is a Final Devolution based server. It is very stable and fit to hold a lot of players. The main goal of the server is to re-create old runescape back in 05 before dragon claws and armadyl godswords were the main koing weapons. There will be a good economy and a medium-hard exp rate.
[center][b]Developers[/b][/center] [center]1. Scape-JAVA[/center] [center]2. Pkpoison[/center]
[center]Features[/center] [center] [IMG]http://i356.photobucket.com/albums/oo5/xloggernubs/advert5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i356.photobucket.com/albums/oo5/xloggernubs/advert3-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i356.photobucket.com/albums/oo5/xloggernubs/ADVERT2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i356.photobucket.com/albums/oo5/xloggernubs/advert1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i356.photobucket.com/albums/oo5/xloggernubs/advert4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i356.photobucket.com/albums/oo5/xloggernubs/tut2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i356.photobucket.com/albums/oo5/xloggernubs/tut3.jpg[/img]
[/center]
[center][b] Update log[/b][/center] [code] 12/16/09 - Added 377 client icons. 12/15/09 - Made it so you can't trade or walk while frozen. 12/15/09 - Fixed dragon longsword spec (It hit double) 12/15/09 - Fixed Dragon Halberd Spec 12/15/09 - Added Dragon Hatchet Spec 12/15/09 - Added a death message. ("Can anybody defeat you? Clearly not " +playerName+"."); 12/15/09 - Added 0 items kept if skulled. 12/14/09 - Added Shops. 12/14/09 - Added skulls in wilderness. 12/14/09 - Added npc dialog. 12/14/09 - Finished a quest for ancient magics. 12/14/09 - Started Tutorial Island [/code] [center][b]
Town Progression[/b][/center] Lumbridge - %100 Varrock - %100 Camelot - %100 Falador - %100 Catherby - %100
UNDER CONSTRUCTION

item.description:
@pkpoison wrote:

[center]Introduction[/center]
Remember when you would make millions of gp in one day pking in Edgevill? Or how about being able to kill people with a dds instead of a godsword or claws. How about sitting in Falador merchanting items? Well that’s why we’re here.
[center]Goal[/center]
iRevolution is a Final Devolution based server. It is very stable and fit to hold a lot of players. The main goal of the server is to re-create old runescape back in 05 before dragon claws and armadyl godswords were the main koing weapons. There will be a good economy and a medium-hard exp rate.

[center]Developers[/center]
[center]1. Scape-JAVA[/center]
[center]2. Pkpoison[/center]

12/15/09 - Made it so you can't trade or walk while frozen.

12/15/09 - Fixed Dragon Halberd Spec
12/15/09 - Added Dragon Hatchet Spec
12/15/09 - Added a death message. ("Can anybody defeat you? Clearly not " +playerName+".");
12/15/09 - Added 0 items kept if skulled.
12/14/09 - Added Shops.
